legal.title: Customer intellectual property regulations
legal.exposure:
Attention:
Due to the intellectual property regulations agreed with this customer,
there is a risk that Schaeffler may have to assign intellectual property
rights (e.g. patents, know-how, copyrights) or grant exclusive licenses
therein.
The consequence would be that Schaeffler cannot use (or at best only
to a limited extent) the Schaeffler developments for other customers,
or that the customer may make Schaeffler technology available to a
second source.

Therefore, make sure that the risk for Schaeffler is eliminated before
the discussions on every case
(see also Legal - Contract Guidelines Intellectual Property - All Documents).

If you have any questions, please contact the competent legal and
patent department.
